ComicInfo.Summary: ...To Hunt the Hulk!: The Hulk finds himself in the Soviet Union, where he encounters the Super-Soldiers and a new menace. Meanwhile, Glenn Talbot slips further into madness and Rick Jones tries to recruit Captain America's help for the Hulk.
